column5: Well I just got the one today. Fished a spot I haven't fished since I was a kid and lo and behold right there at my feet was this girl. Fighting them in the creeks sure is a rush, especially when they go for the overhanging trees, logjams or rockpiles.    Still determined to find a 20lber in the Mighty Lynn!
Well done...That's a good size creek carp anytime.  Cheers  Craig
Sweet Niagra waterfall/mullet  Nice carp to man!
would have been a better pic if sugarpacket/Splenda was holding it! LOL nice bottom feeder man!  Gerritt.

Nice carp Rich.  It's amazing that you can get carp of that size from a creek.  Those river carp sure are long and thin compared with the fat heavyweights from Lake O.  Good job - good luck in the search for that twenty!  007
